tool_description: A webscraping API delivering recent news headlines from the world of digital nomads.
name: Digital Nomad News
title: Digital Nomad News

api_list.name: GET News Articles by Source
api_list.description: Returns all recent news articles for a single source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://digital-nomad-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/forbes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "digital-nomad-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://digital-nomad-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "digital-nomad-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET All News Articles
api_list.description: Returns all recent news articles about digital nomads from all sources.
